name: Yu
description:
Immerse yourself in the tranquillity of nature in VR. 

Allow yourself to let go. 

Breathe with the sun rise and reach a state of calm. 

All with the guidance of a fish.

Ethan Tilley - Project Lead/Technical Director
Riley Lollback - Artistic Designer
Benjamin Phillips - Creative Lead
Brea Pringle - Audio Designer

If you want to follow our future projects, see some cool stuff in the works, or just wanna say hi, feel free to follow us on twitter

@AChairTooFew
Ethan Tilley - @EthanTilley_
Riley Lollback - @RileyLollback
Benjamin Phillips - @Benjamin_MBP
Brea Pringle - @june_slug

note: only available as windows build at the moment. VR build receiving final tweaks.
